timeline.message: Fix handling of final pipelines when destination is changed

timeline.bodyText: I think this field should be volatile? A different thread sets this field and a different thread reads this field.

timeline.bodyText: I think if state is null then an error should be returned? If a node has been started and is ready to accept requests then all components like IngestService should have been provided a cluster state.
